member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Tests.TestBase
member.summary: Base class for unit tests providing common test utilities and helpers.

member.name: P:FluentPDF.Core.Tests.TestBase.Fixture
member.summary: AutoFixture instance for generating test data with randomized values. Use this to create test objects without manually specifying all properties.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Tests.TestBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TestBase class. Sets up AutoFixture with default configuration.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Tests.TestBase.CreateStrictMock``1
member.summary: Creates a mock of the specified type with strict behavior. Strict mocks require all method calls to be explicitly set up.
member.typeparam: The type to mock (must be an interface or abstract class).
member.returns: A Mock instance configured with strict behavior.

member.name: M:FluentPDF.Core.Tests.TestBase.CreateLooseMock``1
member.summary: Creates a mock of the specified type with loose behavior. Loose mocks return default values for methods that are not set up.
member.typeparam: The type to mock (must be an interface or abstract class).
member.returns: A Mock instance configured with loose behavior.

member.name: T:FluentPDF.Core.Tests.Utilities.PageRangeParserTests
member.summary: Comprehensive tests for PageRangeParser covering all valid formats and edge cases. Tests validate parsing of single pages, ranges, multiple ranges, and error scenarios.
